fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- On odd nights, choose one player to attack.
- You will attack exactly one person that visits you each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will clean those you kill directly.
- Players that die from visiting you will have only their alignment shown and their will destroyed.
- If you do not select a target, you will attack someone at random.
- If you are roleblocked, you will kill one of your visitors instead of your target.
